ProfilePage.bio_placeholder: I'm new to SquadUp! Ready to find a team and compete.

EditProfileDialog.description: Make changes to the profile here. Click save when you're done.
EditProfileDialog.avatar_admin_only: Only the user or an admin can change the avatar.
EditProfileDialog.name: Name
EditProfileDialog.name_admin_only: Only the user or an admin can change this.
EditProfileDialog.bio_placeholder: Tell us a little about this user
EditProfileDialog.bio_admin_only: Only the user or an admin can change this.
EditProfileDialog.team_member_alert_desc: Your skills are managed by your team lead. To change them, leave your current team.
EditProfileDialog.looking_for_team_desc: This makes you visible in the player market.
EditProfileDialog.skills_roles_desc: Select up to 2 roles for your primary game.

TeamsPage.delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your team and all its data. Your role will be reverted to 'player'.
TeamsPage.no_team_title: You don't have a team yet
TeamsPage.no_team_subtitle: Create your own team to start recruiting players!
TeamsPage.no_team_join_prompt: Search the market to find your ideal squad.
TeamsPage.join_requests_desc: Review players who want to join your team.
TeamsPage.default_join_message: I'd like to join your team!

MemberManager.kick_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. {name} will be permanently removed from your team.

EditTeamDialog.title: Edit Your Team
EditTeamDialog.description: Make changes to your team's details. Click save when you're done.
EditTeamDialog.looking_for_players_desc: Enable this to list your team on the market.
EditTeamDialog.required_roles_desc: Select the specific roles your team needs.

CreateTeamDialog.title: Create Your Team
CreateTeamDialog.description: Fill out the details to create your own team. As founder, you'll be able to manage it.
CreateTeamDialog.description_placeholder: Describe your team's goals and culture...

TournamentsPage.title: Tournaments
TournamentsPage.subtitle: Compete for glory and prizes.
TournamentsPage.no_tournaments_subtitle: Check back later for upcoming events.

ProposeTournamentDialog.title: Propose a New Tournament
ProposeTournamentDialog.description: Fill out the details for your tournament idea. Our staff will review it for approval.
ProposeTournamentDialog.name: Tournament Name
ProposeTournamentDialog.desc_rules_placeholder: Describe your tournament, including rules, prize pools, stream links, etc.

MessagesPage.no_conversations: You have no conversations. Add friends from the market to start chatting.
MessagesPage.select_chat_subtitle: Choose a conversation from the list to start chatting.
MessagesPage.block_confirm_desc: This action is irreversible. You will not be able to send or receive messages from this user and they will be removed from your friends list.
MessagesPage.delete_history_desc: This will permanently delete all messages in this conversation for both participants. This action cannot be undone.
MessagesPage.remove_friend_desc: This will remove this user from your friends list and the chat history will be permanently deleted. To chat again, you will need to send a new friend request.
